Detailed Description

Base class for a drawable object, which contains a text. The text may have it's own format and color.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

void AbstractTextObject::SetColor (  const Color &  color  ) 
 

Sets the color of the text. Per default the system color of Color::ClientForeground is used.

void AbstractTextObject::SetFont (  const Font &  font  )  [virtual]
 

Sets the font which is used for drawing the text. Per default the system font Font::Client is used.

Reimplemented in AnimatedTextLine.

BOOLEAN AbstractTextObject::SetProperty (  ResourceParser &  parser,
const GuiObjectFactory::PropertyId  prop_id
) 
 

Initializes the instance by reading out a resource file generated by ARAGON. This method may not be invoked by the MMI in a direct manner and might be changed in future releases.

Reimplemented from DrawableObject.

Reimplemented in AnimatedTextLine, TextBox, and TextLine.

void AbstractTextObject::SetText (  const WString &  text  ) 
 

Wrapper method for SetText(w_str.GetCString()).

void AbstractTextObject::SetText (  const WCHAR *  text  )  [virtual]
 

Sets the text of the object. It's in the hand of the view object whether the text will be wrapped or not at the boundaries.

Reimplemented in AnimatedTextLine.

Sets the format which is used for drawing the text.
